WorkItem.Description: Despite of setting ResizeMode="NoResize" and WindowStyle="None", I am not able to prevent window resize for the MainWindow

Comments.Message: For me it seems like this is no issue of m:ui. Just setting ```ResizeMode="NoResize"``` in the demo app works as intended. I can only say: you are doing something wrong. You could zip and attach a small project here in which your problem can be seen.
